attributes.action: hold a referendum in the UK regarding acceptance of the new EU constitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government does not have a right to transfer power to un-elected bodies or anyone else, without the express permission of the British people. Ireland has agreed to hold a referendum, so we should be allowed to decide also!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
